name: Child's Play 3
tagline: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy that defeated him and has since become adult.

name: Kiss of Death
tagline: A reformed convict goes undercover with the help of an angry detective to ensnare a psychotic mobster.

name: Killing Them Softly
tagline: Jackie Cogan is an enforcer hired to restore order after three dumb guys rob a Mob protected card game, causing the local criminal economy to collapse.

name: The Commitments
tagline: The travails of Jimmy Rabbitte to form the "World's Hardest Working Band," The Commitments, and bring soul music to the people of Dublin, Ireland.

name: Indian Summer
tagline: Seven friends reunite for a week-long reunion at a summer camp in Ontario they used to attend as children which is now threatened with being closed down.

name: Flirting with Disaster
tagline: A young man, his wife, and his incompetent case worker travel across country to find his birth parents.

name: The Cave
tagline: Bloodthirsty creatures await a pack of divers who become trapped in an underwater cave network.

name: Election
tagline: A high school teacher's personal life becomes complicated as he works with students during the school elections.

name: Last Chance Harvey
tagline: In London for his daughter's wedding, a rumpled man finds his romantic spirits lifted by a new woman in his life.

name: Music of the Heart
tagline: Story of a schoolteacher's struggle to teach violin to inner-city Harlem kids.

name: All I Want for Christmas
tagline: Hallie and Ethans divorced mother is about to remarry. When Hallie goes to visit Santa Claus, she asks for an unusual gift - she wants her parents back together again.

name: Ladybugs
tagline: To climb the corporate ladder to success, a guy agrees to coach the company's all girl soccer team with the help of his secret weapon: his fiancee's son.

name: I Love You, Beth Cooper
tagline: A nerdy valedictorian proclaims his love for the hottest and most popular girl in school - Beth Cooper - during his graduation speech. Much to his surprise, Beth shows up at his door that very night and decides to show him the best night of his life.

name: Radio Days
tagline: A nostalgic look at radio's golden age focusing on one ordinary family and the various performers in the medium.

name: Not Without My Daughter
tagline: An American woman, trapped in Islamic Iran by her brutish husband, must find a way to escape with her daughter as well.

name: My Left Foot
tagline: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

name: Tristan + Isolde
tagline: An affair between the second in line to Britain's throne (Franco) and the princess of the feuding Irish (Myles) spells doom for the young lovers.

name: School Ties
tagline: A Jewish boy goes to an elite prep school in the 1950's and hides his religion until a jealous bigot forces it out in the open.

name: Kickboxer
tagline: Kurt Sloane must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.

name: Iron Monkey
tagline: A martial artist/doctor steals from the corrupt authorities as a masked thief to give to the poor while another martial artist/doctor is forced to hunt him down. But a major threat unites them as a powerful and traitorous shaolin monk takes over the authorities.

name: Arthur 2: On the Rocks
tagline: Arthur loses all his money, and his wife wants a baby.

name: My Soul to Take
tagline: A serial killer returns to his hometown to stalk seven children who share the same birthday as the date he was allegedly put to rest.

name: Children of the Corn
tagline: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed.

name: My Week with Marilyn
tagline: Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier's, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during production of The Prince and the Showgirl.

name: The Girl Next Door
tagline: A teenager's dreams come true when a former porn star moves in next door and they fall in love.

name: Flight of the Intruder
tagline: In the Vietnam War, a bereaved US Navy A-6 Intruder tactical bomber pilot schemes with a hardened veteran to make an unauthorized air strike on Hanoi itself.

name: Soldier
tagline: A soldier is dumped on a waste disposal planet and lives among a community of crash survivors on the planet and takes it upon himself to defend his new home when genetic engineered soldiers are ordered to eliminate the crash survivors.

name: Hellraiser
tagline: An unfaithful wife encounters the zombie of her dead lover, who's being chased by demons after he escaped from their sado-masochistic Hell.

name: Wild at Heart
tagline: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.

name: School Daze
tagline: A not so popular young man wants to pledge to a popular fraternity at his historically black college.

name: The Vanishing
tagline: The boyfriend of an abducted woman never gives up the search as the abductor looks on.

name: Fly Me to the Moon 3D

production.name: Le Tax Shelter du Gouvernement Fédéral de Belgique

tagline: Three young houseflies stow away aboard the Apollo 11 flight to the moon.

name: Jackie Chan's First Strike
tagline: This installment of Chan's Police Story series has our hero trying to locate a missing nuclear warhead.

name: Tora! Tora! Tora!
tagline: A dramatization of the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor and the series of American blunders that allowed it to happen.

name: Welcome to Mooseport

production.name: Mediastream Vierte Film GmbH & Co. Vermarktungs KG

tagline: A US president who has retired after two terms in office returns to his hometown of Mooseport, Maine and decides to run for Mayor against another local candidate.

name: Life or Something Like It
tagline: A reporter interviews a psychic, who tells her that she's going to die and her life is meaningless.

name: Hollywoodland
tagline: A detective examines the mysterious death of George Reeves, TV's Superman.

name: The Chamber
tagline: A young man fresh out of law school tries to win a reprieve for his racist grandfather who is on death row.

name: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
tagline: A large Halloween mask-making company has plans to kill millions of American children with something sinister hidden in Halloween masks.

name: Snow Falling on Cedars
tagline: A Japanese-American fisherman may have killed his neighbor Carl at sea. In the 1950's, race figures in the trial. So does reporter Ishmael.

name: Ishtar
tagline: Two terrible lounge singers get booked to play a gig in a Moroccan hotel but somehow become pawns in an international power play between the CIA, the Emir of Ishtar, and the rebels trying to overthrow his regime.

name: Awake
tagline: The story focuses on a man who suffers "anesthetic awareness" and finds himself awake and aware, but paralyzed, during heart surgery. His mother must wrestle with her own demons as a drama unfolds around them, while trying to unfold the story hidden behind her son's young wife.

name: Bears
tagline: A documentary that follows an Alaskan bear family as its young cubs are taught life's most important lessons.

name: Capitalism: A Love Story
tagline: An examination of the social costs of corporate interests pursuing profits at the expense of the public good.

name: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
tagline: After a freak accident, an invisible yuppie runs for his life from a treacherous CIA official while trying to cope with his new life.

name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
tagline: With the aid of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using his son's life-generating device, the Genesis Device, as the ultimate weapon.

name: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan
tagline: A passing boat bound for New York pulls Jason Voorhees along for the ride. Look out New York, here comes hell in a hockey mask.

name: Dark City
tagline: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun and run by beings with telekinetic powers who seek the souls of humans.

name: Godsend
tagline: A couple agree to have their deceased son cloned, under the supervision of an enigmatic doctor but bizarre things start to happen years after his rebirth.

name: Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever

production.name: MHF Erste Academy Film GmbH & Co. Produktions KG

tagline: Tasked with destroying each other, an FBI agent and a rogue DIA agent soon discover that there's a much bigger enemy at work.

name: Lockout
tagline: A man wrongly convicted of conspiracy to commit espionage against the U.S. is offered his freedom if he can rescue the president's daughter from an outer space prison taken over by violent inmates.

name: The Wizard
tagline: A boy and his brother run away from home and hitch cross country with the help of a girl they meet to compete in the ultimate video game championship.

name: Josie and the Pussycats
tagline: A girl group find themselves in the middle of a conspiracy to deliver subliminal messages through popular music in this send up of the music industry and pop culture.

name: True Grit
tagline: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn young woman track down her father's murderer in Indian territory.

name: Freddy Got Fingered
tagline: An unemployed cartoonist moves back in with his parents and younger brother Freddy. When his parents demand he leave, he begins to spread rumors that his father is sexually abusing Freddy.

name: Amelia
tagline: A look at the life of legendary American pilot Amelia Earhart, who disappeared while flying over the Pacific Ocean in 1937 in an attempt to make a flight around the world.

name: Alex & Emma
tagline: A writer must turn out a novel in thirty days or face the wrath of loan sharks.

name: Prince of Darkness
tagline: A research team finds a mysterious cylinder in a deserted church. If opened, it could mean the end of the world.

name: Disaster Movie
tagline: Over the course of one evening, an unsuspecting group of twenty-somethings find themselves bombarded by a series of natural disasters and catastrophic events.

name: Ernest Scared Stupid
tagline: After a misunderstanding, Ernest P. Worrell unleashes an evil troll on Halloween.

name: The Messenger: The Story of Joan of Arc
tagline: A young girl receives a vision that drives her to rid France of its oppressors.

name: Spring Breakers
tagline: Four college girls hold up a restaurant in order to fund their spring break vacation. While partying/drinking/taking drugs they are arrested only to be bailed out by a drug and arms dealer.

name: Poltergeist III
tagline: Carol Anne is staying with her aunt in a highrise building, and the supernatural forces that have haunted her previously follow her there.

name: Cool World
tagline: A comic strip vamp seeks to seduce her cartoonist creator in order to cross over into the real world.

name: How to Deal
tagline: A teenager (Moore), disillusioned by too many examples of love gone wrong, refuses to believe that true love exists. Then this new guy (Ford) comes along...

name: Diner
tagline: A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.

name: The Emperor's Club
tagline: An idealistic prep school teacher attempts to redeem an incorrigible student.

name: The Arrival
tagline: Zane, an astronomer discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret, and will do anything to stop Zane from learning it.

name: FairyTale: A True Story
tagline: Two children in 1917 take a photograph, believed by some to be the first scientific evidence of the existence of fairies. Based on a true story.

name: The Good Girl
tagline: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.

name: Virus
tagline: When the crew of an American tugboat boards an abandoned Russian research vessel, the alien life form aboard regards them as a virus which must be destroyed.

name: Creepshow 2
tagline: Three more bone-chilling tales that include a vengeful wooden Native American, a monstrous blob in a lake, and a hitchhiker who wants revenge and will not die.

name: Hatari!
tagline: A group of men trap wild animals in Africa and sell them to zoos. Will the arrival of a female wildlife photographer change their ways ?

name: Stand and Deliver
tagline: The story of Jaime Escalante, a high school teacher who successfully inspired his dropout prone students to learn calculus.

name: What's Your Number?
tagline: A woman looks back at the past twenty men she's had relationships with in her life and wonders if one of them might be her one true love.

name: To the Arctic 3D
tagline: A journey into the lives of a mother polar bear and her two seven-month-old cubs as they navigate the changing Arctic wilderness they call home.

name: Lord of the Flies
tagline: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.
